title: 4 et demi...
overview: The series is based on the central couple of Louis and Isabelle and the people around them: the best friend of Louis, Francois Dion, Isabelle does not like, the best friend Isabelle, Maryse Lemieux, that Louis does not love their neighbors, Julien Champagne and his daughter Gabrielle; colleagues in the veterinary clinic where Dufour Louis works: Pamela Lalonde, Marjolaine Tremblay, not to mention Dr. Pascal Constantin ...
